description.text: this message file contains message for package view

msg.text: The single ended port [CLK $$s] is placed on the differential complement of PCLK ($$s).
The differential positive of PCLK ('$$s') is recommended to avoid routing delays.
There are not enough eligible pins following the dropped location in the current bank, thus not all ports are assigned.
You can only swap one pin at a time.
Current operation will unlock all incompatible pins.\nClick [Yes] to continue.
The destination pin is already locked.
